item.title: BJP Demands Restoration of Historic Bakkamma Bavi and Temple in Aija
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Under the leadership of Mandal BJP President Gopalakrishna, BJP leaders visited the ancient Bakkamma Bavi (Well) in Aija town and emphasized the need for its immediate restoration.
Speaking on the occasion, former BJP Jogulamba Gadwal district president Ramachandra Reddy highlighted the historical significance of Bakkamma Bavi. He explained that the well dates back to the reign of Nalla Somanadri (Peddha Somabhupaludu), who ruled Gadwal Samsthan between 1668 and 1712. The well was named...]]>
item.author: The Hans India

item.title: LRS Rebate Deadline Extended Until April 30
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District Collector B.M. Santosh announced that the Telangana government has extended the deadline for the Layout Regularization Scheme (LRS) rebate until April 30. Applicants who have applied for plot regularization under the LRS scheme can now avail themselves of a 25% rebate on the registration fee until the end of this month. The Collector urged all eligible plot owners to take advantage of this opportunity.
The Telangana government, through a directive issued by Municipal Administra...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
